title: Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed
description: Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed. It already tried, and it can't.8.
OB: When attempting to remove references to invalid views, the system encounters difficulties and fails, leaving them unaddressed.
EB: The plugin was not available the last time Eclipse was closed, so the workbench should have no more reference to this plugin.7.
SR:
1. Open Eclipse with the plugin installed and active.
2. Close Eclipse without making the plugin available.
3. Reopen Eclipse and observe if references to the plugin's views are still present.
